title: EV Charging Station Time Slot Booking System - Frontend

requirements.summary: Display charging stations list with real-time availability
acceptanceCriteria: Charging stations are displayed in a list or grid view
Each station shows name, location, and number of available ports
Interface updates to reflect current availability

file_operations.description: Create a component to display charging stations in a grid layout showing station name, location, port capacity, and current availability using the shadcn-ui Card component
Create the main stations page that fetches station data from the backend via getAvailableSlots and renders the StationList component with real-time availability updates
Add routing for the StationsPage as the main browsing view in the application router

requirements.summary: Implement calendar and time picker for slot selection
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select a date from a calendar view
Available time slots are displayed for the selected date
Unavailable slots are visually distinguished from available ones
Users can select a time slot to proceed with booking

file_operations.description: Create a time slot picker component that displays available 30-minute slots for a selected date and station, fetching availability via getAvailableSlots backend method, with visual distinction between available and booked slots
Create a date picker component using shadcn-ui Calendar component to allow users to select a charging date
Create the booking page that integrates DatePicker and TimeSlotPicker components to allow users to select station, date, and time slot for booking
Add routing for BookingPage with station parameter to enable navigation from station list to booking flow

requirements.summary: Create booking confirmation flow with review and submission
acceptanceCriteria: Booking summary displays station name, date, time slot, and port number
Users can confirm or cancel the booking before submission
Successful bookings show a confirmation message
Failed bookings display appropriate error messages

file_operations.description: Create a booking confirmation component that displays booking summary (station, date, time, port) and provides confirm/cancel actions using shadcn-ui Dialog and Button components
Integrate BookingConfirmation component into the booking flow, handling submission via bookSlot backend method and displaying success/error messages using shadcn-ui Toast
Create a booking success confirmation page displaying booking details and providing navigation back to dashboard or station list
Add routing for BookingSuccessPage to display after successful booking confirmation

requirements.summary: Implement Internet Identity authentication for user booking management
acceptanceCriteria: Users can log in using Internet Identity
Bookings are associated with authenticated user principals
Users can only view and manage their own bookings

file_operations.description: Create a custom hook to manage Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout functionality using the core-infrastructure backend connection
Create an authentication button component that displays login/logout actions based on authentication state from useAuth hook, using shadcn-ui Button component
Create a layout component that includes the AuthButton in the header/navigation area and wraps page content
Wrap application routes with Layout component to provide consistent authentication UI across all pages
Create a protected route wrapper component that checks authentication status and redirects to login if user is not authenticated

requirements.summary: Create user dashboard showing current and upcoming bookings
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays user's active bookings chronologically
Each booking shows station name, date, time, and port number
Users can view booking details

file_operations.description: Create a booking card component to display individual booking details including station name, date, time, and port number using shadcn-ui Card component
Create a user dashboard page that fetches bookings via getMyBookings backend method and displays them chronologically using BookingCard components, wrapped with ProtectedRoute for authentication
Add routing for DashboardPage as a protected route accessible only to authenticated users
Add navigation link to Dashboard in the header navigation menu for authenticated users

requirements.summary: Add booking cancellation functionality with time restriction
acceptanceCriteria: Users can cancel bookings from their dashboard
Cancellations are only allowed if more than 1 hour remains before start time
Cancelled slots become immediately available for other users
System displays appropriate messages for cancellation attempts within the 1-hour window

file_operations.description: Add a cancel button to BookingCard that checks if booking start time is more than 1 hour away, disabling the button with appropriate messaging if within the 1-hour window, using shadcn-ui Button component
Create a custom hook to handle booking cancellation logic, including time validation and calling cancelBooking backend method, with error handling and success feedback

Integrate useCancelBooking hook into DashboardPage to handle cancellation actions from BookingCard components, refresh booking list after successful cancellation, and display feedback messages using shadcn-ui Toast

requirements.summary: Design modern eco-friendly interface with green and electric blue theme
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme consistently uses green and electric blue throughout the application
Typography is legible and hierarchy is clear
Layout facilitates easy navigation between station selection, time slot booking, and user dashboard
Design conveys an eco-friendly, modern aesthetic

file_operations.description: Update global styles with green and electric blue color variables in the CSS custom properties, establishing primary (green) and accent (electric blue) colors with appropriate shades for the eco-friendly theme
Configure Tailwind theme to extend default colors with green and electric blue palette, setting up eco-friendly color scheme that matches the global CSS variables
Apply eco-friendly color scheme to Layout component header and navigation using green/electric blue theme colors, ensuring consistent branding across pages

Wire the generated electric vehicle charging station illustration into the StationsPage as a hero section header image using the workspace file path frontend/public/assets/generated/ev-station.dim_800x600.png
Wire the generated green energy eco-friendly icon into the Layout component header/branding area using the workspace file path frontend/public/assets/generated/eco-icon.dim_128x128.png
Add hero section to StationsPage incorporating the generated ev-station.dim_800x600.png image with eco-friendly styling and clear typography hierarchy
